title: Psalms 62:1
text: TRULY my soul waiteth upon God: from him cometh my salvation.

title: Psalms 62:2
text: He only is my rock and my salvation; he is my defence; I shall not be greatly moved.

title: Psalms 62:3
text: How long will ye imagine mischief against a man?  ye shall be slain all of you: as a bowing wall shall ye be, and as a tottering fence.

title: Psalms 62:4
text: They only consult to cast him down from his excellency: they delight in lies: they bless with their mouth, but they curse inwardly.  Selah.

title: Psalms 62:5
text: My soul, wait thou only upon God; for my expectation is from him.

title: Psalms 62:6
text: He only is my rock and my salvation: he is my defence; I shall not be moved.

title: Psalms 62:7
text: In God is my salvation and my glory: the rock of my strength, and my refuge, is in God.

title: Psalms 62:8
text: Trust in him at all times; ye people, pour out your heart before him: God is a refuge for us.  Selah.

title: Psalms 62:9
text: Surely men of low degree are vanity, and men of high degree are a lie: to be laid in the balance, they are altogether lighter than vanity.

title: Psalms 62:10
text: Trust not in oppression, and become not vain in robbery: if riches increase, set not your heart upon them.

title: Psalms 62:11
text: God hath spoken once; twice have I heard this; that power belongeth unto God.

title: Psalms 62:12
text: Also unto thee, O Lord, belongeth mercy: for thou renderest to every man according to his work.
